rules_text:
When Warden of the Dead enters, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
When Warden of the Dead dies, conjure three cards named Warden of the Dead and shuffle them into your main library. For the rest of the game, you may cast cards named Warden of the Dead without paying their mana cost.
notes:
!exportname Warden of the Dead Reminder
!script "<s><l>Conjure three Warden of the Dead</l><f>/spawnx3 Warden of the Dead Reminder 101</f></s><s><l>Cast for free reminder</l><f>/spawn Warden of the Dead Emblem 101</f></s>","r"
